title: 1's and 0's and 225
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the smallest positive base-10 integer composed entirely of 1's and 0's that is divisible by 225."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"225 = 9 * 25"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Numbers divisible by 25 end in 25, 50, 75 or 00. So our number must end in 00."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Numbers divisible by 9 have a digital root divisible by 9. So our number must have 9 1's in it. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, the number in question is 9 1's followed by 00, or 11,111,111,100."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
